ValidationRule.description: An Jeff Ulmer Commission must be 11%
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && NOT(OR($RecordType.Name = "Health & Benefits", $RecordType.Name = "Scale", $RecordType.Name = "ReShield" )) &&
AND( Marketer_UW_Name__r.LastName = "Ulmer", Commission_Rate__c <> 0.11, ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Approved/Closed Won") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Commission Rate: A Jeff Ulmer Commission Rate must be 11%
